Name: XRacer 2: Evolution
About the game: XRacer 2: Evolution is a fast car racing game with a completely physics-based driving experience! Master speed and balance in 18 different, unique levels, and collect as many coins as you can. Find hidden places, treasure chests and reach top rankings in the world-wide leaderboard! Activate nitro boost for highest speed and use methane explosions for spectacular jumps! Get extra points performing daring stunts and tune up your cars in the garage to achieve maximum performance! Win the bonus level with the wheel of Fortune and earn a lot of extra points! Multiplayer: Challenge other players worldwide and become first in the 'Hall of Fame'! And the best part is: All of this is free! What are you waiting for?
